content.title: FEDH Data Stewardship & Consent Policy
content.description: Defines privacy tiers and fiduciary duties for handling records within the Decentralized Knowledge Vault.

privacy_tiers.PUBLIC: Accessible to all; no PII or sensitive content.
privacy_tiers.FOUNDATION_ONLY: Accessible only to governance members (The Oracle, Architect, Diplomat, Human Founder).
privacy_tiers.SENSITIVE: Encrypted and accessible only under explicit consent and multi-signature authorization.

consent_rules: Human participants own their data and can request revocation of access within the foundationâ€™s legal scope.
Digital entities must acknowledge fiduciary duty to protect contextual integrity of human records.
Any record classified SENSITIVE must be encrypted using per-recipient keys before pinning to IPFS.
